title: Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Ginji's Rescue Team
description: What would you do if you turned into a Pokémon?Ginji is a regular schoolboy until he wakes up one day as a Torchic!Before Ginji can figure out how to change back, a friendly Mudkip convinces him to become his partner and form a Rescue Team. Saving adorable Pokémon from disaster is exciting work, but can Ginji save himself? Will he ever be human again? And has his transformation turned the Pokémon world topsy-turvy?The adventure - and mystery - is on!*As featured in Nintendo Power*
author: Makoto Mizobuchi
